verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In the sweet by and by,
We shall meet on that beautiful shore

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Thereâ€™s a land
that is fairer than day,
And by faith
we can see it afar,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
For the Father
waits over the way
To prepare us
a dwelling place there.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
And our spirits
shall sorrow no more -
Not a sigh
for the blessing of rest.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
To our bountiful
Father above
We will offer
the tribute of praise

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
For the glorious gift
of His love
And the blessings
that hallow our days.
